name: Coffee Break (itch) (floppers09)
description:
Make tiny 2D coffees, in a tiny 2D cafe!

MINI GAME BREAKDOWN:

GRINDER:
Tap A and D in time as the buttons flash to grind coffee beans!

ESPRESSO MACHINE:
Hold S to measure the coffee grounds as they fill the cup, be careful not to overflow!

LATTE ART:
Use W to chase the white diamond in time with the milk pouring into the cup, the closer you are to the diamond, the faster the milk pours!
